chatbot: Floating Chatbot shows on all routes except /AI and admin/login; on /AI it renders full-screen inside the page.
History persists locally; Clear chat button resets the conversation.
Keyboard: Enter to send, Shift+Enter for newline; Esc closes the floating chat window.
Short, friendly answers; supports Markdown (bold, lists, links, inline code).
routes: / — Main Site with immersive 3D background and Overlay navigation.
/AI — Dedicated AI page with full-screen Chatbot and inline Spotify section.

navigation: Top bar with buttons: Home, About, Achievements, Education, Organizations, Projects, Contact, Message.
Switch sections by clicking buttons; About’s "View Achievements" also jumps to Achievements.
home: Center hero text: ‘Hi, I'm Aryan – Computer Science Student’ with subtitle ‘Aspiring DevSecOps Engineer’.
about: Interactive 3D-hover profile card with holographic avatar and light-following glow.
Stats pills and CTAs: Contact Me (mailto), View Achievements (navigates), GitHub link.
achievements: Year-based timeline; each entry may include a certificate.
Preview certificate inline (Eye button) or open in Google Drive (Open button).
education: Scrollable timeline with animated progress line; active item tracks scroll/mouse position.
Logos shown for Brawijaya University and SMA Negeri 1 Singosari when applicable.
organizations: Filter tabs: All, Active, Past; search box filters by org/role/year.
Cards highlight Active roles; grid adapts responsively.
projects: Mini Games: tabs for Chess and Flappy Bird; scores/settings persist locally.
Banner notes the section is WIP and invites playing the mini games.
contact: List of social links with copy buttons (copy link or handle).
Includes Email, LinkedIn, Instagram, GitHub; X is noted as ‘on development’.
message: Send a direct message: Instagram username (optional, validated), Initials/Name (required), Message (required, 500 chars).
Shows success/fail status; sanitizes @username and validates via serverless API.
performance: Performance button opens settings: Auto (device-aware), Lite (reduced motion), High (full effects).
visuals: Full-viewport 3D scene background, glassy overlay UI, mobile notice, optional shutdown overlay.

header: British coat of arms icon left of the title.
RGB gradient title with elegant periodic sheen and mouse-responsive highlight.
Description: ‘Your intelligent gateway to explore Aryan’s journey and insights…’.
chatbot: Full-screen Chatbot card with Clear chat, persistent history, and Markdown rendering.
Typing indicator and slow-processing hint, draggable in floating mode (not on /AI).
spotify: Inline ‘Tune Your AI Vibes’ section with small Spotify logo.
Connect via Spotify OAuth PKCE; Disconnect supported; token auto-refresh.
Search Tracks or Playlists; ‘Preview only’ filter for Tracks; recent queries chips.
Play 30s audio previews (Play/Pause/Stop). Embed track/playlist via button or paste a Spotify URL.
No ‘Now Playing’ queue or Web Playback SDK — previews and embeds only.
visuals: Ambient particle field, gradient glows, subtle grid, and gentle 3D tilt on the chat card.
Reduced motion on mobile for comfort/performance.
access: Floating Chatbot button is hidden on /AI to avoid duplication; use the full-screen Chatbot instead.

chat: Enter to send; Shift+Enter for newline; Esc closes floating chat (not applicable on full-screen /AI).
spotify: Press Enter in the search box to search; paste an open.spotify.com link to auto-embed on blur/paste.
